data.eml:eml: New data on the subgenus Harpopaederus of the genus Paederus (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Paederinae) of mainland China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peng, Zhong, Li, Li-Zhen, Zhao, Mei-Jun (2015): New data on the subgenus Harpopaederus of the genus Paederus (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Paederinae) of mainland China. ZooKeys 495: 143-153, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.495.9484, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.495.9484
